description:
Skyway Park is known as the BEST parking provider for Pearson International Airport near Toronto. This is accomplished by offering very competitive pricing and providing a better more complete parking service best suited for Pearson International Airport.

We offer both an affordable Valet and Self Park Airport Parking that includes our free On Demand shuttle service with luggage assistance.

reviews.title: They drive the cars you leave them to park
text: Take a picture of your odometer, our car was driven over 100 Kilometers after we left it at Vallet parking. Have a dash camera as well. There was coins for around 10$ missing from the car. The car was filled up prior to leaving it there and when we picked it up almost half of the gas was gone, as it was driven. Overall, poor experience, not recommended.

reviews.title: ****If they damage your vehicle don't expect them to pay**** "not resonsible for damage"
text: ****If they damage your vehicle don't expect them to pay****
I left my vehicle keys with them at the Dixon Road location office on Aug 30 2024.

On returning from my vacation on Sept 15 my car was not onsite. An attendant showed up driving soon after and handed me the fob. I took a look around the vehicle and found a dent that was not there when dropped off. The attendant took pictures and said to call on Monday to speak to the manager when I did they said they would call back which they never did. After 10 calls and multiple emails they have not returned any calls or emails

reviews.title: Took my car for a ride
text: This would have been a positive review, but we discovered the car had been driven 12 miles when it was supposed to be parked. We would never use this parking service again.

reviews.title: Be aware
text: This place is scam, beware of false reviews. I used this service to park for a week and added a handwash exterior only. After a very much delayed shuttle service at the terminal, I arrived to find my dirty dirty car waiting for me. I had the employee take pics of the bugs and bird poop all over my car right away but he was unable to do anything about it. of course i knew right away this was going to be a scam. the manager who was promised to call never called so i did the calling but the poor employee had to take the heat. Owner takes no responsibility.  i was asked to email a Suresh so will see what happens. something tells me nothing after reading the other reviews.

reviews.title: Reasonably priced Excellence!
text: SKYWAY PARK at Toronto airport is GREAT Value with GREAT service.  Especially Suresh who is so professional and kind.  We have used Skyway Park for many years and find it's Valet service is Excellent and the most reasonably priced in the area.  We use their Dixon Rd. location.  THANKS as always Suresh.

reviews.title: Excellent
text: They were very friendly and quick. Pick up within minutes. Car there when we arrived at lot. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Great Service
text: Always use Skyway Park when departing from YYZ. Courteous and prompt service. Had to drop off car in a different location than a few years ago/pre-COVID but it was fine. Pick up when we returned was good. They took pictures of our car at drop off and we checked the car when we returned. All good. Will use them again in future. Price was very reasonable.

reviews.title: Avoid this company if you want your car to be returned undamaged
text: I had detailing done in September 2023 and my windshield was cracked when I picked up my car. The company acknowledged there was no crack when I brought the car in.  They would not reimburse for repairs but promised a discount on my next visit.  I had detailing done again when I left my car in March 2024.   I returned to a second cracked windshield. They refused to honour the promised discount and have not returned my calls, email, and text, which included pictures of the cracks. Customer service is non-existent.

reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
text: Had used Skypark in the past but decided to try Skyway for a 3 week trip. The initial experience was good, no problems dropping off the car and quick valet ride to airport.
Pickup at the airport was also timely and the car was waiting for us. As it was late and we still had a couple of hours drive ahead of us we quickly load our bags and headed home.
The next morning, I  noticed that there were several fresh deep scratches on the driver's side back quarter panel.
We called Kumar who said the boss would call us back that afternoon or the next morning and would make it right.
Despite repeated calls over 2 weeks we haven't heard anything from them.

reviews.title: I received excellent service at a good price!
text: So difficult to pick a parking service when flying out of Pearson, reviews seem to be all over the place but this is my recent (March 2024) experience with Skyway Park. For me the service I received was excellent! I chose the valet service, brought my car to their lot, went in, paid, was told where to wait when I returned, was given a vehicle number to quote and the number to call shuttle when returning (returning at 3am) and the shuttle was right there to pick me up and take me to airport, no waiting, dropped off where I needed to be at airport. On return, went to where I was to be picked up, called office, gave the vehicle number, was told 10 minutes, the shuttle arrived in less time than that at 3am. My car was running, lights on, warmed up at the lot, I put my bags in and off I went. Less money than Park N Fly and the line for Park N Fly shuttles was long on my return, there were many still waiting for the next Park N Fly shuttle (only so many can go in the shuttle at one time) while I was already off to get my car. Would I use this service again, absolutely!

reviews.title: PLEASE DON'T PARK YOUR CAR AT THIS PLACE
text: Never park your car at this place, I park my brad new car in valet parking at this place for one month and when I received my car they damage one of my car rim and nobody answer me. I call to owner and manger of parking for one week and he not response my call. their employee talking very bad and they cut off my phone.
PLEASE DON'T PARK YOUR CAR AT THIS PLACE

reviews.title: Will not be using Skyway Park in future
text: The parking lot where we left our car was beside Wet 'n Wild Amusement Park on Finch Avenue West.  It was not a paved parking lot, and there was no one on duty when we arrived, which was a little concerning since so many cars are parked there with what appeared to be no security during the day.  I asked the driver about this when he arrived, and he advised that there was a security guard at night.  We had provided our return flight details, yet had to wait about 20 minutes for the van to arrive.  We called as soon as we had retrieved our luggage as instructed, but it appears that there are only one or two vans operating at a time, so therefore, customers have to wait.  In the meantime, while we were waiting, we had counted 10 Park'n Fly vans come by.  If Skyway Park is serious about their business, they need to improve customer service.  Also, the van was not very clean.

reviews.title: Worry Free Airport Parking Experience
text: Don't cheap out...Go Valet!!! Its worth every penny.
Easy to get to; 2 minutes from terminal; fantastic service to and from; car was washed and warmed up on our return. Can't say enough good things about Skyway.
Have been a customer since 97...why would you go anywhere else?

reviews.title: Top Notch Parking at Skyway Park
text: I have been using Skyway Park for over 27 years and  I will continue to use them...
They are always readily available and the service departing  and returning are so easy... worry free...peace of mind... Valet Park only way to travel
My last experience was Sept 2021 came back from a family trip and what a surprise my car was detailed beyond my expectations, WOW...
I am booked again for the end of this month, lets see what they do this time...
Great bunch of guys, please keep up the great work...

reviews.title: Another quality airport parking experience.
text: After 25 years of using Skyway Park,  they continues to give me the best airport parking experience I’ve ever had at any airport in the world. Bravo!

reviews.title: First rate airport parking service
text: our previous lot was closed due to the pandemic so we tried Skyway.
We couldn't have been more pleased.
No wait at all to be driven over to the airport (a big tricky to find Skyway but turn in at LoneStar Texas Grill and you'll see their small sign) with valet service for our car.
Less than 10 minutes to be picked up on our return.

Very friendly staff. And because our stay was 5 days, a free car wash too.  We'd booked through a third party (hadn't spotted that at the time of the online booking) but they still honoured this promotion they'd offered that I'd only found out about after the booking was made.
While you never know how businesses like this one may go depending on how busy they are and the staff available, they earned this review in every way.

reviews.title: Skyway park Toronto
text: I  have been using Skyway Park to park my car while I am away for weeks at a time for the past 6 years . I have also tried other car parks but always return to Skyway Park as their rates are the best , as well as their service is the best!!! The wait time to register your car and take the shuttle is only minutes .  The pick up from the airport is also very fast . Staff are very friendly , no issues leaving my car at their park at all .  While you are away you can also have your car cleaned and detailed which I did once and the car looked amazing !!
I would highly recommend this car park if you are needing to leave your car while you travel

reviews.title: Off-airport parking
text: I have used a few different off-airport long-term parking facilities for Pearson and this has been the most convenient. The shuttle both ways was fast and the Belfield Road site was easy to get to and leave from to get on the highway. Excellent price at the time (March 2021), and friendly, efficient service. I did not take advantage of the car detailing this time and will next time – a neat feature.

reviews.title: Fabulous first time experience
text: I can not compliment these guys enough !
First time customer and they delivered as promised !
Car was cleaned  off and warmed for us on a cold February night after being picked up at Pearson … will definitely use again

reviews.title: Terrible experience
text: New location is just plain crap. One guy in booth, long car line up to register. Came at 4am, was busy, noticed cars turning around and not parking in lot. When we got to the booth we were told they overbooked
Lot and we need to find somewhere else. At 4 am,already in a rush, omg. Found park and fly 6 blocks away….never again. We had used this service  maybe 15 times over the years, never again….

reviews.title: Quick and efficient
text: Efficient entry, no issues as we picked a spot 3 lanes down and were picked up by the shuttle within 5 minutes of arrival. It was 3:30 AM. Prompt service upon return as well. Paid in advance, no additional charges were incurred. Thanks again to Sky Park.

reviews.title: Avoid this disaster of a service
text: We have been parking at Skypark for years when travelling abroad. The service has gone way downhill since Covid. Since they have moved from the Faskin Drive location service has gotten terrible. They have no more “Valet Service” that they advertise. You basically drive into their disaster of a lot and park. You then sit in your vehicle with the lights on until your transfer comes to pick you up. This is once you get past the ignorant attendant you have to deal with when paying. This was the last time I’ll park here.

reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service!
text: Really disappointed with my recent experience there. I was charged the full amount for a 1 month stay despite showing them my coupon for the one month special. Left several VVM and email messages and know one returned my calls or emails. Very poor customer service!

reviews.title: NEVER TRY TO PARK HERE
text: Had a reservation for parking and nobody there, called and was rudely told lot was full and they hung up on me !  NEVER PARK HERE !!

reviews.title: Skyway is the best!
text: We've been using Skyway park for more than a decade and have never been disappointed with the service.  They have always been prompt, courteous and very helpful.  We have mistakenly gone to another airport parking facility and were left standing in the rain waiting for a shuttle.  Skyway is the best!

reviews.title: Won't use them again
text: Reserved parking online prior to my trip.  When I arrived they couldn't find my reservation so I had to pay $10 more.  Took a picture of the odometer when I left it.  They put over 12 km on my vehicle.  They said it was taken to an offsite lot.  The fuel consumption gauge showed that they drove it hard.  I wasn't told it would be taken anywhere.  My husband went to put his seatbelt on only to find it had been broken off previously.
Attendant picked us up slamming our bags in the back.  Not friendly.  Coasting through red lights.  Not at all impressed with their way of doing business.  Would never use them again.

reviews.title: Happy customer
text: Used Sky Park Toronto when we went to Vegas August 20th.  Quick and easy.  No waiting for a shuttle to airport or when we returned.  Had my vehicle detailed while we were away and when we got back the vehicle looked like new (spotless inside and out). Friendly people with attention to detail.  Thanks for the excellent service, we will use them again when we go away in January.  You have made a happy and loyal customer.

reviews.title: Excellent service
text: I have been using Skyway Park to park my car weeks at a time for many years. The service is wonderful , friendly , helpful with luggage , respectful of your car. I would never consider using any of the other parking services. I have recommend family and friends to use Skyway park for their holidays and everyone has been happy with the service and the price.  If you are travelling and need to leave your car at the airport , I highly recommend this company.

reviews.title: USE another service - one that takes care  you during and after your trip
text: Poor care and service- beware!

I am not one who typically uses social media to express my opinions or complaints, but I have been left no option but to warn other future customers about the poor service and follow up I received from SkyWay Park on Dixon Road by the Pearson Airport. ( they may have moved recently to a new location)

Jan 9, 2024, we returned from our vacation around 7 pm. During the day it was a snow event that turned into cold wet rain. We were dropped off by the shuttle bus and the car was waiting for us by the door as it should for valet service.

We got off the bus and unloaded our luggage into the back of our SUV. That is when I noticed I had a completely flat rear tire. I had to point that out to the men working at Skyway and asked why they Drove my car to the door if it was flat, and why did they not inform me of the tire when I arrived. I was told, “it was fine driving up here, it must be a slow leak as that can happen when your car sits for a while”.  I said to them “not likely as it has sat for a week and it would have been flat before you drove here and you would have noticed it riding on the rim, and you were going to let me drive away with a flat in this weather” I asked for the manager to contact me the next day.

I got a lot of excuses and then 4 men tried to assist by changing my tire in rain but clearly none of them new what they were doing. I had to call CAA and wait almost 2 hours. As a result, I ended up driving the back roads home on the spare (donut tire) versus using the 401 in the rain. I should have gotten home around 8 it was almost 11pm.

Next day I had my tire looked at and my mechanic determined it was a puncture in the middle of the tread and not a slow leak. That someone had to have driven over something to puncture it. Sadly, as my tires were not newer, I had to purchase 4 new snow tires as it was not repairable, the puncture was that big and you cannot patch. as it is not advised to match a new tire with 3 other older tires I had to purchase 4.
I did not hear back from the manager and I emailed the customer service to inform them of the situation and the lack of service.

I finally got a call back after my email and they offered me no apology and 1-week free parking on my next trip. I said “that was not acceptable and that they were going to let me pull out of the parking lot on flat and that more should be done.”

Jumping to 8 weeks later almost after several calls and no call back or various excuses and me even asking for the manager’s boss to call me I still have not had a resolution except 3 weeks ago they offered 2 weeks free parking. I asked to have a full refund and 1 of the 4 tires paid for as that would be the least, they could do. If SKYWAY PARK really wanted me to return to use their business they  would have reimbursed me, for the headache and inconvenience of their mistakes.

With no customer service follow up, no call backs by the manager or owner why would I want to return to a business that does not care about the customer and mistakes they made. I would not trust they would take care of my car.
I have used other similar businesses on my travels in the past and would recommend to anyone travelling to use them and NOT SKYWAY PARK.
ENJOY your trips and stay away from SKYPARK.

reviews.title: Excellent Service
text: This parking space & facility is located in a perfect location. Kumar & his team are very professional & make sure that you feel comfortable leaving your vehicle in their hands.  We would highly recommend this space. They are promptly there when needed.
Thanks Skyway Park

reviews.title: We paid for valet service and the service we received was unsafe and completely inadequate
text: The drop off service was great. We dropped off our car and keys for valet parking and were promptly taken to the airport.
The pickup was absolutely ridiculous.

Upon arriving at Pearson we called multiple times and the phone wasn't even answered. When we finally got through it sounded like the person on the other end of the line was driving and talking to someone else. I tried to provide my account # so that our car would be prepared for us, he just kept shouting "19! 19!"

When we went to pole 19 we joined a group of people who were all disgruntled about not being able to get through on the phone. The driver loaded our baggage the van was full with 2 seats remaining. The driver proceeded to another stop and loaded more passengers whose school aged children had to  sit on their parents knees. It was overcrowded and definitely unsafe. When we arrived at the parking lot the driver asked if we all had car keys. We replied thst we did not as we had valet service. The driver obtained our keys and began to drive around  the snowy parking lot , letting people off at their vehicles. The driver handed my husband an envelope with our keys and dropped us off at our frozen, snow covered car with our baggage and left. We were not prepared . We had light jackets, no toques or gloves and had to clean the snow and ice from our frozen car anyway. We paid for valet service but certainly did not receive it. I will never use Skypark.ca again. Unsafe and terrible service.
Sharon and Rick Gauthier

reviews.title: BE AWARE!!!
text: BE AWARE! I made reservations at Skyway Park with Kumar(I believe he is the owner) to park our vehicle for a week while away on vacation. Kumar promised additional 20% off, no questions asked after I show him a copy of our itinerary. Once we arrived his employee told us that Kumar is not here and he can’t give us any discount. I contacted Kumar several times and still no call back or discount. Also their shuttles could definitely use cleaning since they advertise car detailing. Wouldn’t use Skyway Park again.

reviews.title: ABSOLUTE WORST SERVICE & INCOMPETENCY - FINCH LOT
text: Skyway Park facilty on Finch Ave at the Wild Water Kingdom site was the worst experience I have ever had.
Booked online on Dec 28th for parking on Dec 31st - Jan 8th, 2024 (7 days)..paid $128.00.

When returned on Jan 8th...it was like pulling teeth to get a shuttle at the airport...then finally got to the lot & they wanted $40 more because they said I booked the parking from Dec 28th to Jan 5th!

I told them I booked online on Dec 28th...I did not park on the 28th. I parked on Dec 31st..they insisted, it was late & I had a 5 yr old that need to go to school the next morning but they insisted I booked the parking for the 28th.
Do you not realize you drove me to the airport on the 31st!!! Was my vehicle on your lot on the 28th??
ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE EXPERINCE...I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN.

reviews.title: Great Service
text: We have been using Skyway Park for years. They are on time, priced right, with friendly staff. Once we were really running late for our flight and they made sure they got us out of the lot and to our terminal in time to make it (barely)

Last year we booked for a month but had to extend our stay by a couple of days due to catching covid and were charged for the extra days. This year they remembered and gave us a discount on our charges. We will keep using them for years to come. Great service

reviews.title: Terrible
text: Sketchy lot. We waited an hour for the shuttle. After 30 mins we called again and the guy was sooo rude!! We waited in the cold until almost 2 am.

reviews.title: In and out 5 minutes
text: We had booked online but paid onsite. We arrived at 10:30 am on a Tuesday morning, staff was friendly and efficient.
Took 5 minutes to pay get our luggage and be on the road. Wish the rest of our trip is this smooth

reviews.title: Stay Far Away!
text: I've used Skyway Park for many, many years in business and always had great service.  Recommended them over all the others, always. This time, I inquired about long-term parking.  I was speaking with the manager and got his name and cell #.  He appreciated the compliments I gave regarding the many years, and he said they were not like the others but had integrity.  I explained I did not yet have my return date but would need 5, possibly 6 weeks.  He gave me a rate for 30 days and assured me there would be NO ADDITIONAL CHARGE.  What a load of bull that was.

When we knew our return flight plans, I called and gave the details.   Our flight was delayed a couple hours but we were picked up by the shuttle when I called.   My car was waiting for us, but I was held hostage at 2 in the morning with grandchildren for the keys.  I was told I was 2 weeks over the return date, and they wanted over $500 to get the keys.   I was dumb founded.  Surely, there was a mistake.  "No additional charge" was what the manager had told me when I booked it.

After arguing with the attendant and even trying the managers cell I ended up paying an additional $269 to get my keys, only to go to the car and find out there was an additional 37 km put on my car.   They said it was moved to another lot.   That's a lot of km.   I have contacted the manager on numerous occasions, and each time, there is an excuse regarding a refund.  I contacted them again last week and was told a partial refund had been given, but I have never received it. He would call me back.  It not has happened.  I want a full refund for the overcharge of $269 not a partial.  Stand by your word!

If there was a lower rating, I would give it.  I was lied to and now being put off, and I will never use or recommend them to anyone.  Stay far away.  I don't know what happened to them, but there is no integrity in this manager, that's for sure.

reviews.title: good price   good service   good location    VALET parking
text: good prices good location. good staff.

we arrived home from europe tired,  bags lost and then noticed scrape on car.   the men reached the manager mr Suresh K. who assured me all would be looked after.   unfortunately the car had been hit by a snowplow and was recorded.  they do photograph every vehicle in valet parking!!!.
he was a gentleman and all was settled well.  we have used several times and will be back.
it is not luxurious but suitable.   thanks  suresh
